questions.title: Implement an LRU Cache (Design + Core Ops)
questions.prompt: Design an LRU cache with get(key) and put(key, value) in O(1). Explain the data structures you would use and why.
followups: What are the time/space complexities and key invariants?
How would you make it thread-safe?

questions.title: Rate Limiter (High Level)
questions.prompt: Design a simple API rate limiter. Describe the algorithm (token bucket/leaky bucket/fixed window) and what you would store.
followups: What trade-offs exist between fixed window and token bucket?
How would you implement this in a distributed system?

questions.title: Detect Duplicate Requests (Idempotency)
questions.prompt: Your service receives duplicate POST requests due to retries. How do you make the endpoint idempotent?
followups: What would you store as an idempotency key and where?
What edge cases exist (expiry, collisions)?

questions.title: Find the Most Frequent Element
questions.prompt: Given an array of integers, return the most frequent element. Explain your approach and complexity.
followups: How does this change if you need the top K frequent elements?
What's the complexity?
